channel.title: How to configure Tor in Whonix-gateway connect to other VM running proxy?
channel.description:
wwwwhonixorg/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_a_proxy_before_Tor The link doesn't tell me how to set the VM.
The proxy software must run either:
under the linux user account tunnel on Whonix-Gateway ™; or on the host; or in another virtual machine.
I try to have both NAT and internal adapter on my VM, and set the internal to Whonix network, and forward the traffic from Whonix-gateway to VM's internal adapter to proxy software by iptables, the proxy is running, but Whonix-gateway is not connection.

item.title: How to configure Tor in Whonix-gateway connect to other VM running proxy?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
My answer will probably stay the same. I suggest posting a new forum thread to avoid confusing. Then we can delete this one.

Read full topic

Which method?

mrpunpybe:

the VM.

Which VM?

mrpunpybe:

I try to have both NAT

Doing that for Whonix-Workstation is a very bad idea. Can cause clearnet leaks.

mrpunpybe:

The link doesn’t tell me how to set the VM.

Setting change not mentioned means possibly no such settings change required.
